original_title: โคเลสเตอรอลที่รัก
overview: The tale of a promised arranged marriage between two families, Santi and Pairoje. Both children have grown into young adults. Jesada, a handsome and educated young man has just returned home from England. But Lukked, Pairoje's daughter, on the other hand, has grown into an overweight and introvert young women.
title: Cholesterol Love
